name: Moshiur Rahman
title: Full Stack Web Developer
bio: Moshiur Rahman is a highly skilled and passionate full stack web developer from Bangladesh. He specializes in building scalable web applications, intuitive UIs, and secure backend systems. He believes in minimalism, open-source, and developer-friendly ecosystems. He's also deeply passionate about Linux, automation, and building developer tools.
experience: 3+ years professional experience building full-stack applications

projects.name: Coursion

projects.name: CodeCircle

projects.name: Linux Assistant Project
projects.description: An Arch-based AI-powered JARVIS assistant for Linux — integrates voice control, shell commands, and automation using open-source models.

projects.name: Parcel Delivery Platform
projects.description: Real-time parcel delivery system with tracking, region-based coverage system, and Firebase auth.
